problem.markdown:
1. In Drag Link Mechanism
(x) Shortest link is fixed () Longest link is fixed () One other than shortest or longest link is fixed () Any link can be fixed
2. In a Non-Grashof mechanism, if longest link is fixed and shortest link is coupler which type of four bar mechanism would be formed?
() Can't be determined (x) Double Rocker () Crank Rocker () Double Crank
3. Which of the following is possible for Input and Output links in case of Non-Grashof linkage?
() Crank-Crank (x) Rocker-Rocker () All () Crank-Rocker
4. Which is true for a Non-Grashof Mechanism
(x) s+l greater than p+q () s+l less than p+q () s+p greater than l+q () s+p less than l+q
5. If Grashof condition is not met, which link definitely can complete a rotation
() Shorter of the remaining links () Shortest Link () Longest Link (x) None of the links

choicegroup.choice: One other than shortest or longest link is fixed
